doc.name: quote
doc.summary: Equivalent to the double quote character " (ASCII 34).

examples.example: if last char of it is quote then delete last char of it
put quote & field 2 & quote into responseToPost

description.overview: Use the quote constant to embed quotes in a string, and to refer to quotes in a script.
description.comments: You must use this constant because if you use the quote character itself, it is treated as the beginning or end of a literal string and causes an execution error.
